Question: Roboenter Co. Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Roboenter Co. Ltd.

Roboenter Co. Ltd. showcased its product at CES 2024, featuring the following highlights:

- Product categories: Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Digital Health, Computer Hardware & Components, and more
- Products include the AirJet®Mini – Solid-State Active Cooling Chip for Electronic Devices, Gun Detection System, HP Spectre Fold, and RoWok™ by SJW Robotics
- Focus on innovation, functionality, aesthetic, and design
- Emphasis on sectors such as digital health and sustainability, eco-design & smart energy
- Introduction of a new category - artificial intelligence (AI)
- The event also highlighted innovations in sustainability, transportation and mobility, AI, and digital health
- The show featured live keynotes from industry experts
- CES 2024 took place in Las Vegas on Jan. 9-12, 2024

For more details, visit CES.tech and follow CES on social media.
